Elita:

elita woke up and looked to Wolfblade and gtigled while she tried to 
reach her, she was courios what was.



--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "shadowess_azogoth" 
<shadowess_azogoth@y...> wrote:
> Wolfblade::
> 
> She noticed the other wolfbot. She had to admit, he was rather 
cute. 
> But, she turned her attention back to the Tripeds and Malice. She 
> didn't want to see her fellow bots get thier tail pipes kicked in 
> without a proper fight. Being a well trained warrior, she wanted 
to 
> see all the action. No fighting without her was her own rule. She 
did 
> look back at Blackfang and grin a bit. Then she turned her head 
back 
> to the group and the conversation. 
> 
> 
>
